name: Super Roosting
description:
Super roosting is a 1v1 local platform fighter created in 48 hours for the IVGD summer jam 2020.

2 players vie for control of a tiny moving platform, push the other player off while trying not to run out of jumps!

This game requires two controllers to play.

Credits:

Massimo Gauthier - Programming, Game Design, Art

Corinne Philippon - SFX, Music, Additional Game Design
